ideal_precis.title: Insignificant Drop's Rise to Fame
ideal_precis.text: A drop of water, lamenting its triviality amid the vast sea, was swallowed by a nearby oyster mid-soliloquy. Hardening gradually within the shell, it transformed into a pearl. After numerous adventures, it reached a diver's hands and now adorns the Persian crown as a renowned gem.
